channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Coinbase expects lower subscription revenue. A lot more went wrong for the crypto exchange.
item.description: Coinbase pins crypto drop on tariffs and economic uncertainty.

item.title: 5 strategies that separate AI leaders from the 92% still stuck in pilot mode
item.description: Accenture's new research reveals the critical strategies that separate the companies successfully scaling AI from the 92% stuck in perpetual pilot mod...

item.title: MicroStrategy’s stock surges to highest price this year as bitcoin regains $100K
item.description: Bitcoin’s rally boosts the value of the cryptocurrency Strategy has purchased this year by more than $830 million.

item.title: Bitcoin rallies with stocks to top $100,000 again as exuberance returns to markets
item.description: Bitcoin rose above $100,000 for the first time since February, reigniting hopes that the crypto may climb to a new record high.

item.title: This retiree figured out a way to pay almost no taxes. Here’s his secret.
item.description: A Fix My Portfolio reader shares how they avoided a “tax bomb” in retirement through Roth conversions and careful financial planning.

item.title: You can now fine-tune your enterprise’s own version of OpenAI’s o4-mini reasoning model with reinforcement learning
item.description: For organizations with clearly defined problems and verifiable answers, RFT offers a compelling way to align models.

item.title: These cannabis-sector stocks aren’t typical yield plays. Why they’re worth the risk.
item.description: Cannabis-sector lenders offer attractive dividends.

item.title: OpenAI, Microsoft tell Senate ‘no one country can win AI’
item.description: Executives like OpenAI's Sam Altman said US support for infrastructure would make it easier for AI companies to meet demand.

item.title: How The Ottawa Hospital uses AI ambient voice capture to reduce physician burnout by 70%, achieve 97% patient satisfaction
item.description: TOH is using Microsoft’s DAX Copilot to capture physician-patient conversations and generate draft clinical notes in real time.
